mapper.insert: /* PopularSearchWord.insertPopularSearchWord */ INSERT INTO T_PPL_WRD ( PPL_WRD_IDX , PPL_WRD_TEXT , PPL_WRD_SORT , PPL_WRD_USE_YN , PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT , PPL_WRD_ICON_HOT , PPL_WRD_ICON_NEW , PPL_WRD_REG_DT , PPL_WRD_REG_IP , PPL_WRD_REG_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_PPL_WRD_IDX.NEXTVAL , #{PPL_WRD_TEXT} , #{PPL_WRD_SORT} , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_USE_YN}, 'N') , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT}, 0) , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_ICON_HOT}, 'N') , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_ICON_NEW}, 'N') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{PPL_WRD_REG_IP} , #{PPL_WRD_REG_ID} )

/* PopularSearchWord.insertPopularSearchWordHis */ INSERT INTO T_PPL_WRD_HIS ( PPL_WRD_HIS_IDX , PPL_WRD_HIS_TEXT , PPL_WRD_HIS_SORT , PPL_WRD_HIS_USE_YN , PPL_WRD_HIS_HIT_CNT , PPL_WRD_HIS_ICON_HOT , PPL_WRD_HIS_ICON_NEW , PPL_WRD_HIS_REG_DT , PPL_WRD_HIS_REG_IP , PPL_WRD_HIS_REG_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_PPL_WRD_HIS_IDX.NEXTVAL , #{PPL_WRD_HIS_TEXT} , #{PPL_WRD_HIS_SORT} , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_HIS_USE_YN}, 'N') , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_HIS_HIT_CNT}, 0) , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_HIS_ICON_HOT}, 'N') , NVL(#{PPL_WRD_HIS_ICON_NEW}, 'N') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{PPL_WRD_HIS_REG_IP} , #{PPL_WRD_HIS_REG_ID} )
mapper.select: /* PopularSearchWord.selectPopularSearchWordList */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,PPL_WRD_IDX ,PPL_WRD_SORT ,PPL_WRD_TEXT ,PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT ,PPL_WRD_ICON_NEW ,PPL_WRD_ICON_HOT ,PPL_WRD_USE_YN FROM T_PPL_WRD ORDER BY PPL_WRD_SORT ASC

/* PopularSearchWord.selectPcPopSearcWordList */ SELECT PPL_WRD_IDX ,PPL_WRD_TEXT ,PPL_WRD_SORT ,PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT ,PPL_WRD_ICON_NEW ,PPL_WRD_ICON_HOT FROM T_PPL_WRD WHERE PPL_WRD_USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY PPL_WRD_SORT ASC
mapper.update: /* PopularSearchWord.updatePopularSearchWordHit */ UPDATE T_PPL_WRD SET PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT = PPL_WRD_HIT_CNT+1 WHERE PPL_WRD_IDX = #{PPL_WRD_IDX}
mapper.select: /* PopularSearchWord.selectPopSearchWordInfo */ SELECT PPL_WRD_TEXT FROM T_PPL_WRD WHERE PPL_WRD_IDX=#{PPL_WRD_IDX}

SELECT PPL_WRD_IDX, PPL_WRD_REG_DT, PPL_WRD_REG_IP, PPL_WRD_REG_ID, PPL_WRD_UPD_DT, PPL_WRD_UPD_IP, PPL_WRD_UPD_ID, (SELECT TAM.ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST TAM WHERE TAM.ADM_MST_ID = TPW.PPL_WRD_UPD_ID) AS UPDPSN_NM FROM T_PPL_WRD TPW WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY PPL_WRD_UPD_DT DESC
